title: Basics
description: A graduated series of 50 Dhamma talks for meditators, starting with breath meditation and leading through issues of discernment.

title: The Seven Factors of Awakening
description: A series of 7 Dhamma talks following one of the sets of the Buddha’s fundamental teachings from the 37 Wings to Awakening.

title: The Five Strengths
description: A series of 5 Dhamma talks following one of the sets of the Buddha’s fundamental teachings from the 37 Wings to Awakening.

title: The Noble Eightfold Path
description: The Noble Eightfold Path forms the framework for all the Buddha’s teachings. It was the first topic he mentioned in his first sermon, and the last topic he mentioned in his last. The edited transcripts of these talks are available in eBook form as [The Noble Eightfold Path: 13 Meditations Talks](https://www.dhammatalks.org/ebook_index.html#eightfoldPath) on the eBooks page.

talks.title: Right Mindfulness - The First Frame of Reference
Right Mindfulness - The Second Frame of Reference
Right Mindfulness - The Third Frame of Reference
Right Mindfulness - The Fourth Frame of Reference
Right Concentration - The Uses of Right Concentration

title: Refuge from Death
description: A collection of 20 Dhamma talks, chants, sutta readings and guided meditations for listening as one approaches death.

talks.title: Sutta Reading: The Five Recollections (Anguttara Nikaya 5.57)
Sutta Reading: Afflicted in Body (Samyutta Nikaya 22.2)
Dhamma Talk: Preparing to Die Well
Sutta Reading: The Sick Ward (Samyutta Nikaya 36.7)
Chant: Verses on the Noble Truths
Dhamma Talk: Don't Worry, Be Focused (new)
Meditation: Guided Breath Meditation & How to Exit Meditation

title: With Each & Every Breath
description: Thanissaro Bhikkhu’s meditation guide _With Each & Every Breath_ lists recommended Dhamma talks at the end of each chapter. Those talks are presented here in that same order.

talks.title: A Refuge from Illness, Aging, & Death
For the Survival of Your Goodness
A Meditator is a Good Friend to Have
Cutting New Paths in the Mind
On the Path of the Breath

title: Four Guardian Meditations
description: Four meditations to protect you from your defilements.

title: Guided Meditations
description: Guided breath and metta meditations with 5 to 10 minute pauses for experimenting with the instructions.

talks.title: Breath (40m - with steps for leaving meditation)

title: Pali Chanting
description:
• The full Chanting Guide can now be [read online](https://www.dhammatalks.org/books/ChantingGuide/Section0001.html)
• There are also [eBook versions](https://www.dhammatalks.org/ebook_index.html#chanting)
• A print version is available by [request](https://www.dhammatalks.org/ebook_index.html#booklist) at no charge
• There are [pronunciation](https://www.dhammatalks.org/books/ChantingGuide/Section0003.html) and [tone](https://www.dhammatalks.org/ebook_index.html#tone_guide) guides for those trying to learn the chants.

talks.title: Praise and Salutation to the Triple Gem
Reflection at the Moment of Using the Requisites
Praise and Salutation to the Triple Gem
Reflection at the Moment of Using the Requisites
Dhamma-cakkappavattana Sutta | Setting the Wheel of Dhamma in Motion
The Divine Mantra | Purification of the Six Properties

title: Lectures
description: These lectures, given by Thanissaro Bhikkhu at various meditation centers and about 40–60 minutes long on average, provide a systematic and focused explanation—and Q&A—on selected Dhamma themes.

talks.title: Practicing the Dhamma in Accordance with the Dhamma
The Present Moment is Not the Goal
Merit is More Important Than You Think
Ananda: The Man with the Questions
The Ten Perfections: Truth and Virtue (Part 3)
The Ten Perfections: Persistence and Giving (Part 4)
The Ten Perfections: Renunciation Endurance Equanimity (Part 5)
What is Insight and What Good is It?
The Art and Study of Practice
What is Wrong with Buddha Nature
Dependent Co-Arising: Introduction and Q&A (2 of 10)
Dependent-Co Arising: Readings and Q&A (3 of 10)
The Breath: A Vehicle for Liberation (Part 1)
The Breath: A Vehicle for Liberation (Part 2)
The Breath: A Vehicle for Liberation (Part 3)

title: Other Themes
description: Some of these collections have had quite a lot of thought put into them, such as 'Digging Out of Despair', and others not as much. They only contain talks up to 2007.
